root: ^Hey Kid! Not much I can offer you but how ‘bout a lemonade?
^I just woke up so I am pretty thirsty!
^I’m alright, I’m just looking for my parents right now. Have you seen any humans recently?

g-1: ^Well here ya go! So tell me kid, what’s gotcha looking so blue?
^I’m just looking for my parents right now. Have you seen any humans recently?

Bartender_Parents_Question: ^Wow, living humans? Here? Haven’t seen any since yesterday.
^But I have been playing a lot of darts. Mighta been distracted.
^Ooh, can I play? I could use a break from the search!

g-0: ^Of course, here are a set a darts.
g-1: ^I believe my high score is a 100, let's see if you can beat it!
^Woo my first time trying but I will give it a shot!

replay: ^Hey! You are back again! Wanna play darts again?
^Yes pls, I think I can do better this time!
^No thanks, I came to ask about my parents

g-0: ^Hmm, I still haven't seen your parents, come back to play darts anytime!
